text: Ebbe Kops (5 February 1930 - 10 February 2021) was a Danish boxer. He competed in the men's light middleweight event at the 1952 Summer Olympics. Kops died on 10 February 2021, aged 91.OL-bokser fra Nr. Snede er d√∏d ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympians for Denmark Category:Danish boxers
